twc_daily.narrative: Mostly clear. Lows overnight in the low 70s.
Mix of sun and clouds. Highs in the low 90s and lows in the low 70s.
Showers and thunderstorms late. Highs in the upper 80s and lows in the mid 70s.
Afternoon showers and thunderstorms. Highs in the upper 80s and lows in the mid 70s.
Thunderstorms. Potential for heavy rainfall. Highs in the mid 80s and lows in the mid 70s.
Scattered thunderstorms. Potential for heavy rainfall. Highs in the mid 80s and lows in the mid 70s.
Showers. Highs in the upper 80s and lows in the mid 70s.

nws_periods.name: Overnight
nws_periods.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 72. Northeast wind 0 to 5 mph.

nws_periods.name: Friday
nws_periods.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms after 4pm. Mostly sunny, with a high near 91. Northeast wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nws_periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly cloudy, with a low around 73. East wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
